verses.verse: The book <S%G976><s%> of the generation <S%G1078><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> of David, <S%G1138><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> of Abraham. <S%G11><s%>

Abraham <S%G11><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Isaac; <S%G2464><s%> and Isaac <S%G2464><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Jacob; <S%G2384><s%> and Jacob <S%G2384><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Judas <S%G2455><s%> and his brothers; <S%G80><s%>

And Judas <S%G2455><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Phares <S%G5329><s%> and Zara <S%G2196><s%> of Thamar; <S%G2283><s%> and Phares <S%G5329><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Esrom; <S%G2074><s%> and Esrom <S%G2074><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Aram; <S%G689><s%>

And Aram <S%G689><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Aminadab; <S%G284><s%> and Aminadab <S%G284><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Naasson; <S%G3476><s%> and Naasson <S%G3476><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Salmon; <S%G4533><s%>

And Salmon <S%G4533><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Booz <S%G1003><s%> of Rachab; <S%G4477><s%> and Booz <S%G1003><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Obed <S%G5601><s%> of Ruth; <S%G4503><s%> and Obed <S%G5601><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Jesse; <S%G2421><s%>

And Jesse <S%G2421><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> David <S%G1138><s%> the king; <S%G935><s%> and David <S%G1138><s%> the king <S%G935><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Solomon <S%G4672><s%> of her that had been the wife of Urias; <S%G3774><s%>
And Solomon <S%G4672><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Roboam; <S%G4497><s%> and Roboam <S%G4497><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Abia; <S%G7><s%> and Abia <S%G7><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Asa; <S%G760><s%>
And Asa <S%G760><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Josaphat; <S%G2498><s%> and Josaphat <S%G2498><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Joram; <S%G2496><s%> and Joram <S%G2496><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Ozias; <S%G3604><s%>
And Ozias <S%G3604><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Joatham; <S%G2488><s%> and Joatham <S%G2488><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Achaz; <S%G881><s%> and Achaz <S%G881><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Ezekias; <S%G1478><s%>
And Ezekias <S%G1478><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Manasses; <S%G3128><s%> and Manasses <S%G3128><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Amon; <S%G300><s%> and Amon <S%G300><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Josias; <S%G2502><s%>

And Josias <S%G2502><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Jechonias <S%G2423><s%> and his brothers, <S%G80><s%> about <S%G1909><s%> the time <S%G1909><s%> they were carried <S%G3350><s%> away <S%G3350><s%> to Babylon: <S%G897><s%>

And after <S%G3326><s%> they were brought <S%G3350><s%> to Babylon, <S%G897><s%> Jechonias <S%G2423><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Salathiel; <S%G4528><s%> and Salathiel <S%G4528><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Zorobabel; <S%G2216><s%>
And Zorobabel <S%G2216><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Abiud; <S%G10><s%> and Abiud <S%G10><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Eliakim; <S%G1662><s%> and Eliakim <S%G1662><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Azor; <S%G107><s%>
And Azor <S%G107><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Sadoc; <S%G4524><s%> and Sadoc <S%G4524><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Achim; <S%G885><s%> and Achim <S%G885><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Eliud; <S%G1664><s%>

And Eliud <S%G1664><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Eleazar; <S%G1648><s%> and Eleazar <S%G1648><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Matthan; <S%G3157><s%> and Matthan <S%G3157><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Jacob; <S%G2384><s%>

And Jacob <S%G2384><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> Joseph <S%G2501><s%> the husband <S%G435><s%> of Mary, <S%G3137><s%> of whom <S%G3739><s%> was born <S%G1080><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> is called <S%G3004><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

So <S%G3767><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the generations <S%G1074><s%> from Abraham <S%G11><s%> to David <S%G1138><s%> are fourteen <S%G1180><s%> generations; <S%G1074><s%> and from David <S%G1138><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> the carrying <S%G3350><s%> away <S%G3350><s%> into <S%G3350><s%> Babylon <S%G897><s%> are fourteen <S%G1180><s%> generations; <S%G1074><s%> and from the carrying <S%G3350><s%> away <S%G3350><s%> into <S%G3350><s%> Babylon <S%G897><s%> to Christ <S%G5547><s%> are fourteen <S%G1180><s%> generations. <S%G1074><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> the birth <S%G1083><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> was on this <S%G3779><s%> wise: When as his mother <S%G3384><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> was espoused <S%G3423><s%> to Joseph, <S%G2501><s%> before <S%G4250><s%> <S%G2228><s%> they came <S%G4905><s%> together, <S%G4905><s%> she was found <S%G2147><s%> with child <S%G1722><s%> of the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost. <S%G4151><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> Joseph <S%G2501><s%> her husband, <S%G435><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> a just <S%G1342><s%> man, and not willing <S%G2309><s%> to make <S%G3856><s%> her a public <S%G3856><s%> example, <S%G3856><s%> was minded <S%G1014><s%> to put <S%G630><s%> her away <S%G630><s%> privately. <S%G2977><s%>

But while he thought <S%G1760><s%> on <S%G1760><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things, behold, <S%G2400><s%> the angel <S%G32><s%> of the LORD <S%G2962><s%> appeared <S%G5316><s%> to him in a dream, <S%G3677><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Joseph, <S%G2501><s%> you son <S%G5207><s%> of David, <S%G1138><s%> fear <S%G5399><s%> not to take <S%G3880><s%> to you Mary <S%G3137><s%> your wife: <S%G1135><s%> for that which is conceived <S%G1080><s%> in her is of the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost. <S%G4151><s%>

And she shall bring <S%G5088><s%> forth <S%G5088><s%> a son, <S%G5207><s%> and you shall call <S%G2564><s%> his name <S%G3686><s%> JESUS: <S%G2424><s%> for he shall save <S%G4982><s%> his people <S%G2992><s%> from their sins. <S%G266><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> was done, <S%G1096><s%> that it might be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was spoken <S%G4483><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> by the prophet, <S%G4396><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%>

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> a virgin <S%G3933><s%> shall be with child, <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1064><s%> <S%G2192><s%> and shall bring <S%G5088><s%> forth <S%G5088><s%> a son, <S%G5207><s%> and they shall <S%G2564><s%> call his name <S%G3686><s%> Emmanuel, <S%G1694><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> being interpreted <S%G3177><s%> is, God <S%G2316><s%> with us.

Then <S%G1161><s%> Joseph <S%G2501><s%> being raised <S%G1326><s%> from sleep <S%G5258><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> as the angel <S%G32><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> had bidden <S%G4367><s%> him, and took <S%G3880><s%> to him his wife: <S%G1135><s%>

And knew <S%G1097><s%> her not till <S%G2193><s%> she had brought <S%G5088><s%> forth <S%G5088><s%> her firstborn <S%G4416><s%> son: <S%G5207><s%> and he called <S%G2564><s%> his name <S%G3686><s%> JESUS. <S%G2424><s%>
